item.title: AsciiDoc test
item.description: Asciidoc Example 5. Constrained bold, italic, and monospace It has strong significance to me. I cannot stress this enough. Type OK to accept. That really has to go. Example 6. Unconstrained bold, italic, and monospace_ Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) Thatâ€™s fanfreakintastic! Donâ€™t pass generic Objects to methods that accept Strings! It was Beatlemania! Canâ€™t pick one? Letâ€™s use them all.

item.title: Francis Bacon
item.description: Of Studies â€“ Francis Bacon (src link): Of Studies â€“ Francis Bacon (Text) Studies serve for delight, for ornament, and for ability. Their chief use for delight, is in privateness and retiring; for ornament, is in discourse; and for ability, is in the judgement and disposition of business. For expert men can execute, and perhaps judge of particulars, one by one; but the general counsels, and the plots and marshalling of affairs, come best from those that are learned.

item.title: Formules sur page couverture du Colmez
item.description: Lagrange 1771: $ |G| = |H|.|G/H| $ (Colmez p.41: Le cardinal de G groupe fini est multiple du cardinal du sous-groupe H et du quotient G/H ) Fourier 1811: $ \phi(t) = \int e^{2i\pi t x}\hat\phi(x) dx $ ( p.335 - $ \hat\phi $ transformÃ©e de Fourier de $ \phi \in \mathscr L^1 (R^m) $ pour tout x,t $ \in R^m $) Poissons 1816: $ \sum_{n \in \Z} \phi(n)= \sum \hat \phi(n) $

item.title: Markdown Experiments
item.description: Thanks to markdown-it for most of the content of this file! –nm h1 Heading h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +- “Smartypants, double quotes” and ‘single quotes’ Emphasis This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text This is italic text Strikethrough Blockquotes Blockquotes can also be nested…

item.title: README
item.description: hugo is the main command, used to build your Hugo site. Hugo is a Fast and Flexible Static Site Generator built with love by spf13 and friends in Go. Complete documentation is available at http://gohugo.io/. Usage: hugo [flags] hugo [command] Available Commands: check Contains some verification checks config Print the site configuration convert Convert your content to different formats deploy Deploy your site to a Cloud provider.
